name: Sorry I'm Late (boneslygrifter)
description: "Sorry I'm Late" is a rough Twine prototype for a potential future full game. The purpose of this game is to simulate what having ADHD and Autism Spectrum Disorder is like on a day-to-day basis. Play through getting ready for work in the morning as you fight itchy clothes tags, awful showers, doing dishes (or not), and the allure of refreshing your Reddit feed.
